name: Spaaaace Elevator
description:
use ARROW KEYS or A and D to control!
  • My first jam game, but also a first for procedural level generation and recycling game objects from a pool to create a resource-light endless runner.
  • Nerdy detail: the center column rotates using a sine function with y-world-axis-driven offsets for the individual pieces.
  • You rotate around the center of the space elevator.
  • Segments are rotated back into view as they fly past you.
  • Enemies and obstacles rotate around the center column.
  • Everything rotates because Spaaaaaaace. ;)
